channel.title: Go Humble! RSS BOOKS
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle books bundles!

item.title: The Ultimate Top Cow Science Fiction & Fantasy Comics by Top Cow
item.description: Expand your mind‚Ä¶and your comics library
item.content:encoded: There‚Äôs no better time than right now, right this second, to dive into a new world and discover your next favorite comic series! This bundle from our pals at Top Cow showcases the very best of this publisher‚Äôs science fiction and fantasy offerings, and we guarantee you‚Äôll find something to love in these expansive, imaginative stories. Feel the rage of Berserker, a superhero thriller series produced by Milo Ventimiglia during his Heroes days. Uncover a Cold War ‚ÄúUltra Sapiens‚Äù mystery in Hunter-Killer. Delight in the relatably awkward romance and misadventures of Greek mythology retelling Punderworld. There are 41 great comics to choose from in this huge bundle, so get it now at the price of your choice, and support the bookstore and comic shop charity BINC with your purchase!

item.title: Indie Comics United: A Super Bundle of Awesome Stuff
item.description: The best of indie comics at your fingertips!
item.content:encoded: Indie comics and their publishers are having a moment like never before, and what better way to celebrate this achievement than by putting together a bundle of the best of the best? And even better than that?? You can get all of these comics delivered right to your inbox at the low price of your choice!! We‚Äôve partnered with a bunch of indie publishers: Ablaze, Action Lab, American Mythology Productions, Battle Quest Comics, Drawn & Quarterly, Dynamite Entertainment, Fantagraphics Books, Heavy Metal, Living The Line Books, Valiant Entertainment, Zenescope, Hermes Press, and Green Ronin Publishing to support their shared goal of encouraging bold ideas and creativity in their creators and readers, bringing you some of their most beloved titles, like quirky time travel graphic novel There‚Äôs No Time Like the Present, intimate queer family drama Stone Fruit, fairy tale reimagining Grimm Tales of Terror, sci-fi epic Moonray, and the newly revamped Heavy Metal! You choose what you pay for all of these and more, and every purchase supports the Comic Book Legal Defense Fund!

item.title: ESP32, Raspberry Pi, Arduino and Maker Classics by Make
item.content:encoded: Learn how to create and program your own devices using key open-source technologies with our latest Tech Book Bundle. Master widely adopted and approachable platforms like Raspberry Pi, ESP32, and Arduino inside this 20+ ebook library. Enhance your style with wearable electronics, tap into the hidden universe of radio waves, reclaim personal time through home automation, and more! Pay what you want for this amazing bundle, and help prepare kids for the future through Code.org.

item.title: Best of Humble Bundle: Terry Pratchett's Discworld by HarperCollins Encore 2026
item.content:encoded:
Discover Sir Terry Pratchett's Discworld, the beloved comic fantasy universe that‚Äôs brimming with wit, wisdom, and wonder. Start where it all began in the seminal novel The Colour of Magic, which follows the misadventures of the inept wizard Rincewind as he serves as tour guide to Twoflower, Discworld's first-ever sightseer. The hapless duo‚Äôs journeys continue in The Light Fantastic and Sourcery, where the scale of world-threatening hazards (and accompanying absurdities) increase exponentially. You‚Äôll get over 35 Discworld novels in all, touching all corners of this whimsical realm and all manner of its denizens, and you‚Äôll help Room to Read with your purchase!

The titles in this bundle are available through Kobo.com. To access the content, create or log in to your Kobo.com account.

item.title: Cookbooks, Playbooks, and Workbooks by O'Reilly
item.content:encoded: Calling all innovators, changemakers, rule breakers, and beyond. Level up your tech skills with the latest Humble Tech Book Bundle in partnership with the experts at O'Reilly. This massive bundle tackles how to build large language models for security with secure AI applications, how to use essential data management tools, and so much more. Pay what you want for professional-led courses like Data Engineering Design Patterns: Recipes For Solving the Most Common Data Engineering Problems, and help support Code for America with your purchase.

item.title: Sex, Love & Everything In-Between: The Sequel by Cleis Press
item.content:encoded:
Heat up your Valentine‚Äôs Day plans with this bundle of sex ebooks‚Äîyou heard us, ebooks all about sex, from our friends at Cleis Press! Become the sex god, goddess, or nonbinary deity you always dreamed you would be, or simply look up more information on a position or toy you were always afraid to ask about. It‚Äôs all here, from guides to kink, sexercise, and the kama sutra, to good sexual citizenship manuals and hints for how to keep things interesting in the bedroom every single time. This bundle is for couples, multi-partner relationships, and for singles just looking to have a good time or searching for tips on going it solo, so grab it while you can at the price of your choice, and choose your own charity to support with your purchase!

The content in this bundle is intended for mature audiences. User discretion is advised.

item.title: Erotica for Women by Cleis Press
item.content:encoded:
The content in this bundle is intended for mature audiences.

Romance and erotica lovers, we are truly living in the best time for erotic fiction of any and all genres. To celebrate this, we‚Äôve partnered with Cleis Press for a bundle of erotica, romance, and sex writing from the past decade-plus, just in time for Valentine‚Äôs Day! This ebook bundle has 37 books total with a little something for everyone: erotica for women and femmes, bondage erotica, gay erotica, lesbian erotica, gay and lesbian romance, and, yes, even a book about smokin' hot firemen. We have no doubt you‚Äôll find exactly what you need in this bundle, so grab it while you can and help support the charity of your choice with your purchase!

item.title: Fallout Tabletop Mega Bundle by Modiphius
item.content:encoded: Already played every Fallout game? All caught up with the TV show? You can bring the Wasteland right to your living room with this Fallout tabletop roleplaying bundle from Modiphius! You‚Äôll get rulebooks, supplemental materials, and 3D printer files for Fallout: The Roleplaying Game, Fallout: Wasteland Warfare, Fallout: Factions, and more‚Äîall the ingredients to set up your vision of Fallout‚Äôs post-apocalyptic future. Whether you‚Äôre a Vault Dweller, a Ghoul, or suited up with the Brotherhood of Steel, you‚Äôll have everything you need to create your own adventure! Every purchase of this bundle at the price of your choice gets you a one-way ticket to the Wasteland and supports the ACLU!

item.title: Best of Humble Bundle: The Witcher + Cyberpunk by Dark Horse
item.content:encoded: Looking for awesome stories set in two of the most exciting universes around? This bundle of The Witcher and Cyberpunk 2077 books and comics from Dark Horse has the goods for stone cold monster hunters and chromed-out netrunners alike! The Witcher Volume 1: House of Glass sends Geralt on one of most harrowing adventures yet, replete with human drama and haunting terror in equal measures. Cyberpunk 2077: Your Voice is full of dazzling action and corpo intrigue‚Äîthe hallmarks of a killer Night City tale. You‚Äôll also get deep looks into these awesome universes with books like The World of Cyberpunk 2077 and The World of the Witcher, and much more! Pay what you want for this action-packed bundle and help support SpecialEffect with your purchase!

item.title: Massive-Verse by Image Comics
item.description: A Massive-Verse sized Image Comics Bundle
item.content:encoded: Lose yourself in a library of fantastic graphic fiction with this out-of-this-world bundle of comics by acclaimed author Kyle Higgins. Pay what you want for Across the Massive-Verse TP, Vol. 1, the epic first-issues anthology collection of Image‚Äôs biggest stars: Radiant Black, Rogue Sun, The Dead Lucky, and Inferno Girl Red, plus 15+ additional awesome titles. You‚Äôre going to love what we‚Äôve assembled‚Äîexplore Higgins‚Äô best works at Image Comics and help support The BINC Foundation when you shop comics from Humble Bundle!

item.title: Pianos, Music, and More for Dummies
item.content:encoded: Inherited a piano from a long-lost relative but have no idea how to play? Determined to make sense of all that sheet music you have lying around? Got a song in your heart but no way to write it down? This bundle of music instruction books from the team at For Dummies will have you tickling the ivories and composing your symphony in no time! Start simple with some easy piano exercises, get into the weeds a little with music theory, learn the ancient arts of composition, songwriting, and vinyl collecting, or start living that record mogul life with a crash course in music business! Anything a beginner musician or music enthusiast could need is right here, so get these books while you can at the price of your choice, and support Music Will‚Äôs efforts to get music education to students in need with your purchase!

item.title: - Linux for Seasoned Admins by O'Reilly
item.content:encoded: Master the Linux command line, bootstrap yourself into DevOps competency, and gain a whole bunch of other skills to make you a better sysadmin with this bundle of books from O‚ÄôReilly! Included are 15 books covering a range of topics that‚Äôll boost your qualifications and hone your skillset in security, containerization, version control, and much more. Pay what you want for the knowledge and confidence to succeed in a collection of in-demand disciplines, and help support Code for America with your purchase.

item.title: SPRINGFLING 2026 Physical Tabletop RPG Core Book Bundle
item.content:encoded:
Make some space on your bookshelves, because we‚Äôve got a very special book bundle for all the TTRPG enthusiasts out there: a library of physical copies of roleplaying game rulebooks to kick off your next tabletop adventure! Hunt down replicants and have an existential crisis or two in Blade Runner The Roleplaying Game! Save the Mortal Realms from the evil Nagash in Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Soulbound! Master the arts of elemental bending and unite the Four Nations in Avatar Legends: The Roleplaying Game! Grab this collection of roleplaying tomes while you can, and support the ACLU with every purchase at the price of your choice!

Limited Quantities Available! In the US Only.

Keys expire, redeem before March 31st, 2026. Items ship from the Magpie Games Store after March 1st.

item.title: Forgotten Realms Vault by Wizards of the Coast
item.content:encoded: If you‚Äôre a Dungeons and Dragons fan, you‚Äôve likely heard of the Forgotten Realms, fantastical lands of magical creatures and powerful deities that exist in the shadows of our world. But have you ever traveled out into these dangerous places hoping to unearth their secrets, and perhaps have an adventure or two? Now you can, thanks to our newest bundle of 40 fantasy ebooks that comes courtesy of none other than Wizards of the Coast! Here you‚Äôll find thrilling tales of devils, dark elves, mercenaries, and mages from all your favorite authors, including Erin M. Evans, Richard Lee Byers, and Forgotten Realms‚Äô creator Ed Greenwood himself. Spend all the coin you wish and dive right into one of fantasy literature‚Äôs most exciting worlds, and help support the education of children in need with First Book!

item.title: Charlie Jane Anders & Annalee Newitz by TOR
item.description: Speculative fiction like you‚Äôve never seen before
item.content:encoded: You‚Äôve never read sci-fi quite like this. We‚Äôve joined forces with TOR for our latest ebook bundle, which features no less than 21 fantastic ebooks and digital shorts written by acclaimed authors Charlie Jane Anders and Annalee Newitz, co-founders of io9 and co-hosts of the Hugo-winning podcast Our Opinions Are Correct. Survive the dystopian corporate controlled future of Annalee Newitz‚Äôs Autonomous! Journey to the dark side of an alien planet in Charlie Jane Anders‚Äô The City in the Middle of the Night! Follow the exploits of a vengeful mother-daughter witch duo in Anders‚Äô Lessons in Magic and Disaster! Explore a post-war San Francisco with the sentient food service robots of Newitz‚Äôs Automatic Noodle! If you‚Äôve been looking for a wealth of imaginative speculative fiction to add to your library, grab this bundle while you can, and support Miss Major and Alexander L. Lee‚Äôs TGIJP Black Trans Cultural Center with your purchase!

item.title: Doctor Who Audio Adventures by Big Finish
item.description: All of time and space in your headphones
item.content:encoded: Travel through the cosmos alongside the universe‚Äôs friendliest Time Lord with this bundle of Doctor Who audiobooks from Big Finish! Featuring your favorite Doctor Who stars and full cast recordings, this bundle is a treasure trove of adventures for superfans and newbies both. Join the likes of Christopher Eccleston‚Äôs Ninth Doctor, John Hurt‚Äôs War Doctor, and Alex Kingston‚Äôs time-warped archaeologist River Song on their quests through time and space to save the universe from Time Eddies, intergalactic criminals, and those pesky Daleks. There‚Äôs so much more to explore in this audio bundle, so act now to grab it at the price of your choice, and support the BBC‚Äôs Children in Need charity with your purchase! No running required. Well‚Äîmaybe a little bit of running. You never know.

item.title: High Tech Career Playbook Bundle by Manning
item.description: Big time savings on high tech teachings
item.content:encoded: Looking for a new role in tech? Take control of your career and learn the skills you need to succeed with the High Tech Career Playbook Bundle by Manning Publications. Unlock volumes 1‚Äì2 of the acclaimed Acing the CCNA series, the savvy Investing for Programmers course, the C-suite‚Äìready Think Like a CTO lesson, and much more. Pay what you want to flip the script on your career prospects and help support Feeding America with your purchase.

item.title: NBM Graphic Novels 50th Anniversary Collection by NBM Graphic Novels
item.description: Stories you won‚Äôt find anywhere else
item.content:encoded: Celebrate 50 years of incredible graphic novels with NBM! To mark this anniversary, we‚Äôve partnered with the Eisner Award-winning publisher to collect 40 amazing graphic novels hailing from all over North America and Europe‚Äîand bring them straight to your inbox. Enjoy the sumptuously illustrated Fairy Tales of Oscar Wilde, dive into biographies of Rosa Parks and the Beatles, seek adventure with Hasib and the Queen of Serpents, and ride the thrills of the monster theme park at the heart of Zombillenium. If you‚Äôre a fan of graphic novels, great literature, or even just good storytelling, grab this bundle while you can and support hospitalized kids with Starlight Children's Foundation with your purchase!
